Plot: This masterfully crafted first novel tells the spellbinding story of a contemporary woman who discovers her past life as a 12th-century Welsh noblewoman. Erskine's extraordinary romance has been translated into 17 languages and has sold well over a million copies worldwide.
Characters: John of England, Richard de Clare, Jo Clifford, Matilda of Hay, William de Braose, Tim Heacham, Pete Leveson, Carl Bennet, Ann Clements, Nick Franklyn, Sam Franklyn, Adam de Porter, Margaret de Lacy
